verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: Since at least July 2016] , [ARG0: the upper echelon of the FBI and the Department of Justice] [V: began] [ARG1: a stealth operation] — [ARGM-MNR: with the complicity if not instigation of President Obama] — [C-ARG1: to taint and destroy Candidate Trump with a concocted “ Russia collusion ” narrative] .

Since at least July 2016 , the upper echelon of the FBI and the Department of Justice began [ARG0: a stealth operation] — with the complicity if not instigation of President Obama — to [V: taint] and destroy [ARG1: Candidate Trump] [ARGM-MNR: with a concocted “ Russia collusion ” narrative] .

Since at least July 2016 , the upper echelon of the FBI and the Department of Justice began [ARG0: a stealth operation] — with the complicity if not instigation of President Obama — to taint and [V: destroy] [ARG1: Candidate Trump] [ARGM-MNR: with a concocted “ Russia collusion ” narrative] .
